Text: Thanx, great with lossless formats lika flac or ape!
Thanks for the disc! Apple Lossless actually does a bit cleaner job of reproducing the sound stage in acoustic stuff like this, but I'm not saying I don't appreciate FLAC. I'll take what I can get.

LOL, ALAC sounding better than FLAC? They're both *Lossless* Audio Codecs dude- they both decompress to the original .wav file without any information loss. If you're hearing an audio difference \then you're either experiencing a placebo effect or your computer is having trouble decompressing one of the formats.
